content.title: Content
content.description: The HTML-enabled description that serves to introduce the timeline. Usually paired with the Featured Image and shown before the timeline.

feature.title: Featured Image
feature.description: The object holding the timeline's primary image.

url.title: Image URL
url.description: The primary image shown on the Timeline record's page. Usually paired with the Content field and shown before the timeline.

thumbnail.title: Image Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: The small image used when the Timeline record is displayed in a list of records.

alt.title: Image Alternate Text
alt.description: A short textual description of the Featured Image. Required for 508 compliance.

description.title: Sharing Description (Meta)
description.description: A short description of the Timeline, intended to be displayed when sharing the record on social media. Supports limited HTML and is restricted to 250 characters.
